message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you consider that?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, I can't go below $11,500 for this product. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $10,750. Can you consider that?
